languages.text: "Разумное предложение. Думаю, у меня есть, чем вас заинтересовать. Обсудим детали на вашем мостике".
"A reasonable proposal. I think I have something you may find interesting. We can discuss the details back on your bridge."
languages.original_text: "Разумное предложение. Думаю, у меня есть, чем вас заинтересовать. Обсудим детали на вашем мостике".

traits.locale_text: "A reasonable proposal. I think I have something you might find interesting. We can discuss the details back on your bridge."
"A reasonable proposal. I think I have something you might find interesting. We can discuss the details back on your bridge."
"A reasonable proposal. I think I have something you may find interesting. We can discuss the details back on your bridge."
"A reasonable proposal. I think I have something you may find interesting. We can discuss the details back on your bridge."
"A reasonable proposal. I think I have something you may find interesting. We can discuss the details back on your bridge."
"A reasonable proposal. I think I have something you may find interesting. We can discuss the details back on your bridge."

languages.text: «Una solicitud razonable. Creo que tengo algo que encontrará interesante. Podemos hablar de los pormenores en su nave».
languages.original_text: "A reasonable proposal. I think I have something you may find interesting. We can discuss the details back on your bridge."

traits.locale_text: «Una solicitud razonable. Creo que tengo algo que encontrará interesante. Podemos hablar de los pormenores en su nave».

languages.text: “这个提议很合理。我这里有些东西你可能会感兴趣，我们可以先回舰桥，再谈论其他细节。”
languages.original_text: "A reasonable proposal. I think I have something you may find interesting. We can discuss the details back on your bridge."

traits.locale_text: “这个提议很合理。我这里有些东西你可能会感兴趣，我们可以先回舰桥，再谈论其他细节。”

languages.text: « Ça me paraît raisonnable. Je crois avoir quelque chose qui pourrait vous intéresser. Nous en reparlerons une fois de retour sur votre vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "A reasonable proposal. I think I have something you may find interesting. We can discuss the details back on your bridge."

traits.locale_text: « Ça me paraît raisonnable. Je crois avoir quelque chose qui pourrait vous intéresser. Nous en reparlerons une fois de retour sur votre vaisseau. »

languages.text: 「妥当な提案です。あなたが興味を持ちそうなものがあると思います。その詳細については、ブリッジに戻って話し合いましょう」
languages.original_text: "A reasonable proposal. I think I have something you may find interesting. We can discuss the details back on your bridge."

traits.locale_text: 「妥当な提案です。あなたが興味を持ちそうなものがあると思います。その詳細については、ブリッジに戻って話し合いましょう」

languages.text: "Makul bir teklif. Elimizde ilgi çekici bir şey olabileceğini sanıyorum. Detayları köprüde konuşabiliriz."
languages.original_text: "A reasonable proposal. I think I have something you may find interesting. We can discuss the details back on your bridge."

traits.locale_text: "Makul bir teklif. Elimizde ilgi çekici bir şey olabileceğini sanıyorum. Detayları köprüde konuşabiliriz."

languages.text: "Ein vernünftiger Vorschlag. Ich denke, ich habe etwas, das Ihr interessant finden werdet. Die Details können wir auf Eurer Brücke besprechen."
languages.original_text: "A reasonable proposal. I think I have something you may find interesting. We can discuss the details back on your bridge."

traits.locale_text: "Ein vernünftiger Vorschlag. Ich denke, ich habe etwas, das Ihr interessant finden werdet. Die Details können wir auf Eurer Brücke besprechen."
